name: inviZimals: The Alliance
description:
JOIN THE HUNT
Wild Invizimals that only your PlayStation®Vita can see are hiding all around you in the real world. Hunt for fantastic creatures, build them a safe home and battle their sneaky robot foes.

Discover a world of Invizimals
• Hunt everywhere to find over 140 secret creatures.
• Capture them by dodging missiles, zapping robots and more.
• Battle a collection of mighty beasts against your friends.
• Build your creatures a new home to protect them from their robot enemies.
• Take on other Invizimal Hunters in multiplayer battles in ad-hoc mode, using Cross-Play and challenge others online.

1-4 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2-4 Players
10000KB Minimum
Cross-platform play (PS3™)

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
